entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
